import React, {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import "./Sidebar.css"; import PostServices from "../../modules/Post/Service/service"; export default function Sidebar(){ const [posts, setPost] = useState([]); const getValue = async() =>{ await PostServices.showMostReadPosts() .then((res)=>{ // setPost(res.data) console.log(res.data) }) .catch((err)=>{ console.log(err) }) } useEffect(()=>{ getValue() },[posts]) return( <>
{ posts.map((item, index) =>(
MOST READING
{item.title}
One Woman's Search for Everything Across Italy, India and Indonesia.

Eat, Pray, Love
One Woman's Search for Everything Across Italy, India and Indonesia.
